LoRa RX

dev board Arduino UNO
features LoRa RX SPI

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Arduino LoRa firmware

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. LoRa TX

Buy the components

  1. Arduino UNO R3
  2. Adafruit RFM95 LoRa breakout board
  3. Small breadboard

Description

Receive hello from a LoRa point with 433 MHz. Use this with transmitting from a LoRa point.
